channel.title: [317]Npc Help[317]
channel.description:
Hey Moparscapers :D I Got A Problem :S And It Needs Fixing How Do I Change Npc's Health? Is It In Npc.cfg? Becus I Change It For Example [code]//----NpcID-----NpcName-------------------------combat--health npc = 1906 Tough_Guy 75 0[/code]
And I Change Like Tough_Guy Health To 100 For A Test And Combat 100 And I Save&Compile Go In Game And He Dont Have 100Combat Or 100 Health :[ Please Help Thanks
